products.title: Zambezi Taped Stone Real Wood
products.description: Their premium taped zambezi stone real wood blind features a cream painted finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this cream wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price. Add a touch of luxury with complimentary mist tape.

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This handsome perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of great fabrics - here we have it in ash. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This gorgeous perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of quality fabrics - here we have it in carbon. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Amid-greyshade, theash grey25mm perfect fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit
products.description: Perfect fit carbon wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Vertical
products.description: The pale, lilac mist colour is best used in a room where you want the blind to blend in with the rest of the room. Use this with similar pastel tones. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Gibson Powder Grey Vertical
products.description: The lighter grey tone in the gibson powder grey is perfect for use in bathrooms or bedrooms. The vertical slats tilt so you have total control over the light entering your room. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Crown Dark Silver Roller Blind
products.description: With is unique print, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the uniqe print on the front of this blind, you can add a touch of style and class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Crown dark silver roller blind.

products.description: With is unique print, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the uniqe print on the front of this blind, you can add a touch of style and class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Crown light silver roller blind.

products.title: Ritz Steely Grey Roller Blind
products.description: This blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Kerry Stoney Rock Vertical Blind
products.description: The lighter grey colour of the kerry stoney rock is perfect for adding into a more neutral and toned down decor. This blind is great for pairing against lighter grey decors and for blending into the background. This blind is also perfect for bedrooms as the blackout fabric will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Charcoal Vertical Blind
products.description: The dark grey of the kerry charcoal is perfect for adding as darker and mysterious tone to your windows, or pairing in with a darker grey feature wall in your home. This is a blackout fabric so will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Use this in your bedroom if you're woken by the early morning sun or bright streetlamps outside your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Dark Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: The kerry dark grey is probably the colour that would come to mind when someone says the words 'dark grey' to you. With this in mind, we do offer free samples of all their fabrics, but equally, if you're looking for a dark grey blind - this is probably it. Being blackout means this is perfect for your bedroom too as it will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Granite
products.description: The day & night woven granite roller blind lends both style and practicality to any room. Its stone grey colour and premium texture can be used in creating an array of different interior styles. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Linden Fossil Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The linden fossil grey roller blind is a great alternative to a standard grey roller blind, with its leafy pattern its a brilliant way of creating a bold, eye catching look without using bright colours. If youre looking for a grey roller blind with a unique twist, this blind is a great option. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.description: The linden grey roller blind will really enhance any window you put it in, the unique leafy pattern combined with the dark grey gives the blind a unique style. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. products.description: The belmont silver roller blind will add both texture and style to your windows with its beautiful silver and grey contrast. The stripes offer a unique twist on a classic grey roller blind and will really add some personality to your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. products.title: Veil Pebble Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil pebble voile blind has a destinctive grey tone and stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Haze Soft Grey Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The haze soft grey blind is a soft and subtle grey colour that blends into the background of your window. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Pura Pebble Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The pura pebble voile blind is a lovely soft grey colour which has a soft texture to it. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Delicate Mist Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The delicate mist voile blind is the purest white sheer blind we offer in their range. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Cotswold, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Vertical Blind
products.description: The tempered neutrality of the deanna mist brings a cool, traditional feel to whichever window it's used in. This off-white blind is made from a long-lasting, quality fabric that hangs neatly as easily manoeuvrable louvres that you can adjust according to your light and privacy needs. The mist will add a cool look to warmer, bolder colours, such as burgundy in the dining room, plum in the living room, or chocolate in the kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Graphite - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in graphite gives a fantastically contemporary effect that is so versatile that it can be paired with almost any colour scheme. Made from high quality, lightweight fabric that is durable and long-lasting, this is a functional option as well as a chic one. Accent with silvers and whites for a modern living room; team with a bold red to make a statement in the dining room; or create a feature window in a white or cream hallway.

products.title: Deanna, Cool Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sweet and subtle, the deanna in cool grey is a pleasure to behold, with its soft, silvery hue and gently curved patterning, which adds a little depth to an otherwise simple blind. Paired with the right colour scheme and dcor choices, this filter blind can look simply stunning in your home. Team the cool grey with blacks and whites to maintain a contemporary, monochrome colour scheme, offset by hints of silver in the form of ornaments and frames.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The smooth neutral of the origin (blackout) steel is a versatile shade of grey-beige that works well with almost any colour it comes across. The quality blackout fabric works well as adjustable louvres, which can be moved according to how much light you want in your room. Complement a rich burgundy for a traditional colour scheme in the lounge or den, or pair with browns and taupes for a cosy, modern feel in the kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark taupe in colour, the appropriately named origin (blackout) taupe is a wonderfully tactile, cotton-feel fabric that you'll find you just love to touch. Regardless of its forgiving feel, the high quality fabric is hardwearing and resilient, effortlessly serving its purpose as a proficient blackout blind. For warm, welcoming atmosphere, place the taupe against your kitchen window, surrounded by soft creams and the occasional darker brown.

products.title: Faux Silk, Silver - Roman Blind
products.description: It doesn't get more glamorous than the faux silk silver, with its ebony shading and satin-smooth fabric. Raised stitching flecks the cloth, adding texture and flair to this sophisticated roman blind. The silver will hang almost anywhere in the home, whether amongst white walls with mid-grey and silver highlights for a monochromatic scheme in the dining room, with zesty citrus shades for a bright and energising look in the kitchen, or amid pale pastels to add a modern but calming touch to a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Infusion Asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc stone grey perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Infusion Asc Taupe Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc taupe perfect fit pleated blind. products.title: Blackout Roller, Light Grey (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).
